doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 40, Washington, D.C.
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 40, Washington, D.C.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Crime Prevention Coalition and US Department of Justice

1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community. Includes ABC News footage of political debate between Bill Clinton and Bob Dole, in which one audience member asks about ENDA, the Employment Non-Discrimination Act, and another audience member, asks for clarification on the terms "equal rights" and "special rights".
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Academy for State and Local Government, "Be a hero to a child in your community"
2. Interview: Debra Chasnoff, director, discusses her video "It's Elementary: Talking About Gay Issues in School". Includes video clips.
COMMERCIAL: GMHC (Gay Men's Health Crisis), "Help us help."
5. Lou Maletta interviews Edward Alwood, author, regarding his book "Straight News".
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 40, Washington, D.C.: 1996
